hooks.prompt: Check if code files were edited in this turn. If Edit or Write tools were used on code files (.py, .ts, .tsx, .js, .jsx, .go, .rs, etc.) AND the code-simplifier agent has NOT already been run, respond with {"ok": false, "reason": "Run code-simplifier agent on the modified files to ensure clarity and maintainability"}. If no code was edited, or code-simplifier already ran, or only non-code files were modified, respond with {"ok": true}.
